channel.title: COVID-19 on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in COVID-19 on A Hugo website

item.title: R visualization of epidemic in United States
item.description: Epidemic in United States On the another side of the world, however, the disease has rapidly transmitted through the world, especailly United States. As compare to China, it does not implement lockdown and social distancing policy at the early stage of the epidemic. But it’s true that, US’s mass screening and medical system performance has shown the its amazing health-care resources, which is shown in my previous assignment.

item.title: R visualization of Jilin hospitals for patients with fever
item.description: require(tidyverse) require(leaflet) require(leafletCN) if(require(rgeos)){ require(rgeos) } else{ install.packages(("rgeos")) } require(rgeos) Sys.setlocale("LC_ALL",locale = "Chinese") ## [1] "LC_COLLATE=Chinese (Simplified)_China.936;LC_CTYPE=Chinese (Simplified)_China.936;LC_MONETARY=Chinese (Simplified)_China.936;LC_NUMERIC=C;LC_TIME=Chinese (Simplified)_China.936" leaflet() %>% amap() %>% addMarkers(lng=126.560574,lat=43.8444353, popup="北华大学附属医院") %>% addMarkers(lng=126.563828,lat=43.841591, popup="吉林市中心医院")%>% addMarkers(lng=126.571663,lat=43.86306926, popup="吉林市人民医院")%>% addMarkers(lng=126.557518,lat=43.91118, popup="吉林市化工医院一院区")%>% addMarkers(lng=126.552032,lat=43.849449, popup="吉林市妇产医院")%>% addMarkers(lng=126.53116,lat=43.87833, popup="吉林市第五人民医院") {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"calls":[{"method":"addTiles","args":["http://webrd02.is.autonavi.com/appmaptile?lang=zh_cn&size=1&scale=1&style=8&x={x}&y={y}&z={z}",{"minZoom":3,"maxZoom":17,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false},null,{"minZoom":0,"maxZoom":18,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false,"attribution":"© amap.com"}]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[43.8444353,126.560574,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"北华大学附属医院",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[43.841591,126.563828,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"吉林市中心医院",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[43.86306926,126.571663,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"吉林市人民医院",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[43.91118,126.557518,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"吉林市化工医院一院区",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[43.849449,126.552032,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"吉林市妇产医院",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[43.87833,126.53116,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"吉林市第五人民医院",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]}],"limits":{"lat":[43.841591,43.91118],"lng":[126.53116,126.571663]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}
